In this update:
- New Live Event: Treasure Hunts! Earn more gold, beware of Gnomes!
- Enjoy three new bounty tiers!
- Daily login bonus revamp with loyalty program and new subscription offer.
- Guild officers added and leaders now demoted after 14 days of inactivity.
- Normal levels have been made a little bit easier while the elite levels are a wee bit harder.
- Chain spells no longer trigger on hitting the Ice Portal (impacts Hobling, Nightcast, Lamp Wraith, Valkyrie, Vinebeard and Cracklehoof).

In this update:
- Localisation bug fixed where key was displayed instead of text
- Made sure the UI doesn’t allow you to start a location multiple times
- Bug for where offer triggers triggered more than once
- Fixed Layout issue in Daily Rewards
- Fix for reset cost sometimes showing higher amount than it really cost
- User activity time stamp only shown in guild info now
- Fix for live events not appearing when you are active on game mode screen

New in this version:
- It’s Pumpkin Harvest Time! A new creature, live bounties and harvest event coming soon
- Introducing the Land Wyrm, a new Rare creature
- New Live Bounties & Harvest Event: Get Pumpkins by playing the new Bounties event and trade them for Land Wyrm Sun Gems
- Creature balance updates
- App now available in German and Latin American Spanish

New in This Release
- Fix for level 42 making it easier
- Poison mushrooms are now actually poisonous.
- Fixed Land Wyrm big unit attack.
- Time left on boosted Land Wyrm is now correct.
- CPU performance optimization.
- Fixed crash bugs.
- Bounty live event UI is now matching the state of the event
- Fixed bug where common creatures could not be upgraded

New in this update:

- Introducing The Dungeons, a new Guild Boss game mode. Cooperatively slay bosses together. Damage their crystals through combat or daily bombs to weaken the bosses.
- Guild Leaderboards: Players can see how they match up
- Coming this Christmas: The Yule Event. Compete for Thystals in Rainbow and Treasure Gnome events and redeem them for...
- ...a new character! Unlock The Stone Fist this Holiday season.

Thanks for downloading the latest version of Legend of Solgard:
- General economy balance changes
- Bug fixes and updates
- Improvements to Shop Chests

New in this update:

-Journey into Hel's Underworld! Once you reach Hero Level 12 see how deep you can make it and unlock new crafting materials.
-Crafting you say? Introducing Idol Crafting. Collect materials and molds to create special idols that supercharge your creatures.
-Grimbash is coming. A new legendary creature will be unlocked soon. Keep an eye out for the upcoming Ember Event!
-Check out the new Daily Deals in the Shop.

- Helheim, the land of the dishonorable dead, has been added to the campaign!
- Face off with Nykor the Bone Dancer, and his considerably bigger sister; Nykva the Deep Dweller.
- Dungeon Boosters are here! Bump up your own, as well as your guild's performance in the Dungeons with two new powerful boosters.
- Embla’s got a fresh new look (the freshest look in Solgard, some might say).
- iPhone X support.
Minor bug fixes and stability improvements

Become a Legend of Solgard! We’ve updated the Hero Arena and upped the ante for Solgardians trawling for top tier treasure!

In Another League! If you want to be the very best in the 9 Worlds of Solgard, you will have to work your way to the top, and you’ll now benefit from extra buffs to aid your journey, dependant on your Arena League and Position.

A Befitting Prize! We are giving out more loot than ever, dependent on your Arena League and Position, so it pays off to rise to the top and STAY at the top!

Are you a tough tactician or calm combatant? We’ve improved matchmaking so you can choose the way you want to play.

Don’t DRAG ON! You’ll need to think on your feet with Arena units popping in to elevate the challenge as well as the threat of the countdown to death. Tick-tock!

We’ve enriched more depth to the vast story of Solgard, impacting character development, lore and narrative

Introducing Creature Draft Chests! Charge up from a choice of Creatures with Gems, to turn the tides of battles!

Various bug fixes, optimizations and performance improvements

Don’t forget, you can check out the latest tips, updates and developments by joining the Solgard community!

Facebook: www.facebook.com/LegendofSolgard
Twitter: @LegendofSolgard
Reddit: r/LegendofSolgard
Instagram: @LegendofSolgard
Discord: search Legend of Solgard

The biggest update in the history of Solgard is here! We’ve added new creatures (the Mythicals), revamped the idol system, reorganized the creature army, smoothed out Embla’s experience curve, changed how dust works, and more. Veterans have conversion tokens to create new strategies for the new Solgard. Let’s Ragnarok!

For all the details, please join our Facebook group.
